articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Party Leader
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a message of greeting from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico (WPM), on April 7.
					 In the message the national leader paid the highest tribute on behalf of all the members of the WPM and on his own behalf to Kim Il Sung, the father of socialist Korea and the eternal President of the DPRK, on the occasion of his 105th birth anniversary, the significant day not only for the Korean people but also for all the revolutionaries in the world.
					
					 Kim Il Sung, founder of the WPK and the DPRK, was the great thinker-theoretician who fathered the Juche idea and developed it into the guiding idea in the era of independence showing the way for building a new society, the message said, and went on:
					
					 In the belief that the Korean people will always emerge victorious in the struggle to defend socialism, build an economic power and improve the standard of people's living under your wise leadership, we take this opportunity to heartily wish you greater success in your noble work of leading the WPK and the DPRK to victory.

articles.title: Syrian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Syrian Ambassador Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Syrian Ambassador to the DPRK Tammam Sulaiman Wednesday gave a reception at his embassy on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Present there on invitation were Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and vice-chairman of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Yong Jae, minister of External Economic Relations who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Syria Friendship Association, Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University and minister of Higher Education, and officials concerned.
					
					 The ambassador said in his speech that the Day of the Sun is a historic day for the Korean people and the world progressives, adding that Kim Il Sung would be immortal as he performed the immortal exploits before the country and its people with his extraordinary leadership.
					
					 He stressed that the friendly relations provided by the preceding leaders of Syria and the DPRK are given steady continuity generation after generation and the just struggle of the two peoples for frustrating the aggressive moves of the imperialists including the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces would be sure to triumph.
					
					 Ri Su Yong said that the President made a great contribution to the development of the friendly relations among the countries desirous of independence and justice including Syria and the accomplishment of the global cause of independence.
					
					 Saying that the historic and traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries are growing stronger under the deep concern of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and President Bashar Al-Assad, he stressed that the Korean people would as ever invariably support the Syrian government and people in their just struggle.

articles.title: Congratulations to President-Elect of Serbia
articles.content:
Congratulations to President-Elect of Serbia
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Aleksandar Vucic on his election as president of Serbia.
					 Kim in the message wished the president success in his work for the country's prosperity, expressing the belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in conformity with the interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Moldovan Party Delegation Here
articles.content:
Moldovan Party Delegation Here
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Socialist Party of Moldova led by Grigore Novac, vice-chairman of its National Council, arrived here Wednesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Families of Overseas Koreans Related to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle Arrive
articles.content:
Families of Overseas Koreans Related to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle Arrive
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Families of Jie Qing, Chineses related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, Kim Sun Ok related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in China, and overseas Korean Son Won Thae related to the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung arrived here on Wednesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of the President.

articles.title: Congratulatory Group of General Association of Koreans in China Here
articles.content:
Congratulatory Group of General Association of Koreans in China Here
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China led by Chairwoman Choe Un Bok arrived here Wednesday to celebrate the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).

articles.title: Chinese Guests and Koreans Residing in China Here
articles.content:
Chinese Guests and Koreans Residing in China Here
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Wang Dongping, general manager of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse in Dandong, China, and his party, a delegation of the Dandong, China, Tianri Trading Co. Ltd. led by Manager Cheng Xinyan, a delegation of the Jiesibo Trading Co., Ltd in Shenyang, China led by General Manager Zhang Hongchun, and Li Xiangguo, general manger of the China's Yanbian Tiansheng Commercial Co. Ltd., arrived here Wednesday to take part in the 19th Kimilsungia Festival.

articles.title: IIJI Director-General Here
articles.content:
IIJI Director-General Here
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Ramon Jimenez Lopez, director of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and his party arrived here on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Delegation of Federation of Koreans in U.S. Arrive
articles.content:
Delegation of Federation of Koreans in U.S. Arrive
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. arrived here on Wednesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Statues of Great Leaders from Nigerian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Statues of Great Leaders from Nigerian President
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Muhammadu Buhari, president and commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces of Nigeria, sent a floral basket to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill here on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of the President.
					 The floral basket was laid at the statues of the great leaders on Wednesday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from the Board of Directors of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The floral basket was handed over to an official concerned on Wednesday.
					
					 On the same day, he also received a floral basket from Sai Tiejen, honorary vice-chairman of the Foundation Board of Directors.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Foreigners and overseas Koreans Wednesday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 They included a delegation of the Socialist Party of Moldova, family members of Jie Qing, a Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, family members of Kim Sun Ok residing in China related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, the family of overseas Korean Son Won Thae related to the revolutionary activities of the President, and a congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China for celebrating the Day of the Sun.
					
					 They laid bouquets before the statues of the great leaders before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: Members of Missions of Int'l Bodies Pay Floral Tribute to Great Leaders of DPRK
articles.content:
Members of Missions of Int'l Bodies Pay Floral Tribute to Great Leaders of DPRK
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Members of the missions of UNDP, WFP, WHO, UNICEF, FAO and United Nations Population Fund here visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Wednesday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of the President.
					 They laid floral baskets before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The floral basket and congratulatory letter were handed over to Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Roman O. Jimenez Ortega, military attache of the Cuban embassy who is doyen of the corps, on Wednesday.

articles.title: 25th Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Meeting with Kaysone Phomvihane Observed
articles.content:
25th Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Meeting with Kaysone Phomvihane Observed
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A friendly gathering was held at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Wednesday under the co-sponsorship of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, the DPRK-Laos Friendship Association and the Lao embassy here to mark the 25th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's meeting with Kaysone Phomvihane, former chairman of the C.C., Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of Laos.
					 Earlier, the Lao embassy officials laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Present at the gathering were officials concerned, citizens and Lao Ambassador Phonekham Inthaboualy and his embassy officials.
					
					 Speakers there said that the friendly relations between the DPRK and Laos are based on the comradeship forged by Kim Il Sung and Kaysone Phomvihane.
					
					 They added that the bilateral relations are growing stronger under the deep care of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and Bounnang Vorachith, general secretary of the C.C., LPRP and president of Laos.
					
					 They expressed belief that the gathering would mark a good occasion in promoting the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries. 
					
					 Then, the participants watched an art performance of students of DPRK-Laos Friendship Chongryu Junior Middle School in Taedonggang District.
					
					 At the end of the gathering, there took place a sports game between members of the DPRK-Laos Friendship Association and the Lao embassy officials.

articles.title: People's Art Festival Participants Visit Mangyongdae, Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery
articles.content:
People's Art Festival Participants Visit Mangyongdae, Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Participants in the Fifth April Spring People's Art Festival visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They laid bunches of flowers at the graves of Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik, and the graves of Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok and paid silent tribute to them.
					
					 After touring the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum, they looked round the historic mementoes preserved with much care at the President's old home.
					
					 They also visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt Taesong.
					
					 The visitors placed bouquets at the bust of Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war heroine, and paid tribute to her before going round the cemetery.

articles.title: Norwegian Party Leader Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Norwegian Party Leader Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Dag Norum, chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary career of Kim Il Sung, he looked round the mementoes preserved there.
					
					 He went round the revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 The chairman also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Okryu Children's Hospital, the Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital, etc.

articles.title: Senior Officials of Party, State and Army Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Senior Officials of Party, State and Army Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Senior officials of the party and state, the chairman of a friendly party, members of the party central leadership organ here, and officials of ministries and national institutions Wednesday visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, in the run-up to his 105th birth anniversary.
					 After touring the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum, they went to the President's old home. Looking round the historic mementoes preserved with much care, they felt again that the spring of Mangyongdae brought glory to the Korean revolution advancing along the invariable orbit of independence, Songun and socialism.

articles.title: Remembrance Meeting of Workers and Trade Union Members
articles.content:
Remembrance Meeting of Workers and Trade Union Members
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting of workers and trade union members took place in the compound of the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum on Wednesday in the run-up to the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present at the meeting were officials concerned, trade union officials, those who had the honor of being received by the President and leader Kim Jong Il and persons related to their revolutionary activities and other workers and trade union members.
					
					 Kang Chung Sil, chairwoman of the primary party committee of the Songyo Knitwear Factory, referred to the great personality of the President who trained an unknown spinner as a hero of the era and party official.
					
					 Han Jong Gum, an official of Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill, told about the fatherly love shown by the great leaders for her mother Kil Hwak Sil, a pioneer in the movement for human remolding.
					
					 Kang Chol Ho, chairman of the trade union committee of the Chollima Steel Complex, said that his father Kang Ryong Ha, a smelter, became the first labor hero of the complex and a well known Chollima rider under the care of the President, touching the participants.
					
					 Choe Yong Song, chief instructor of the Moranbong District Party Committee, told about the loving care shown by the great leaders for his grandfather Choe Jae Ha, who was the first minister for construction of worker origin.
					
					 Songs "Our Leader" and "Sing, Fork to Mangyongdae" resounded forth at the meeting, deepening its participants' yearning for the President.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
Chongjin, April 12 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen held a meeting at Chongjin Port on Wednesday to celebrate the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Chongjin City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Present at the meeting were the captain and crewmen of the Fiji-flagged ship HAOFAN 6.
					
					 Speakers said that April 15, the birthday of Kim Il Sung is the revolutionary and great auspicious day when the Korean people greeted the peerlessly great man.
					
					 They highly praised Kim Il Sung, who embarked upon the road of the revolution in his early years, as the most prominent leader and peerlessly elder statesman as he created the immortal Juche idea and performed undying exploits for the country and its people, era and history through his great revolutionary practices.
					
					 Kim Il Sung defeated the most ferocious U.S. and Japanese imperialists in one generation, successfully implemented two-stage social revolutions and thus built a socialist power independent in politics, self-sufficient in economy and self-reliant in national defence, they stressed.
					
					 A letter to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Commendations Awarded to Exemplary Youngsters
articles.content:
Commendations Awarded to Exemplary Youngsters
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize and Kim Il Sung Children Honor Prize were awarded to exemplary primary youth league committees, youth league officials and members and children's union members on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 15 primary youth league committees and 33 youth league officials and members received Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize.
					
					 Kim Il Sung Children Honor Prize went to 99 children's union members.
					
					 An awarding ceremony took place at the youth league hall Wednesday.

articles.title: DPRK Order Conferred upon Korean in China
articles.content:
DPRK Order Conferred upon Korean in China
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Order of National Flag First Class of the DPRK was conferred on Choe Ryong Ho, former vice-president of the Yanbian University of Science and Technology of China, with due ceremony at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday. 
					 He has taken an active part in the Kimilsungia festivals and Kimjongilia festivals and made all his sincere efforts to cultivate and disseminate the immortal flowers with profound reverence for the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu.

articles.title: Matriculation Ceremony of Korean University Held
articles.content:
Matriculation Ceremony of Korean University Held
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A matriculation ceremony of Korean University, run by the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), for Juche 106 (2017) took place at the university hall in Tokyo on April 10.
					 Present at the ceremony were senior officials of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, new students of the university and their parents, teaching staff and students of the university and other Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Congratulatory messages from the Education Commission and different universities of the DPRK and Chongryon organs at all levels were read out at the ceremony.
					
					 Chairman Ho Jong Man of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee in his congratulatory speech said respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un has led to shining victory the standoff with the U.S., the cause of national reunification and the building of a socialist power with his brilliant wisdom and outstanding leadership ability and wisely steered the movement of Koreans in Japan on a higher stage as required by the new era of the Juche cause.
					
					 Noting that the new students are the future main players in the movement of Koreans in Japan, he stressed the need for them to prepare themselves as distinguished able persons with Juche character and national character who are knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy through the university life.
					
					 He expressed the firm belief that the newcomers would grow to be reliable native cadres and able talents successfully carrying forward the patriotic tradition.
					
					 Jang Pyong Thae, rector of Korean University, made a report which was followed by speeches.

articles.title: Concert Given by National Symphony Orchestra
articles.content:
Concert Given by National Symphony Orchestra
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A concert "Glory to General Kim Jong Un" was given by the National Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theatre on Wednesday to mark the 5th anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state.
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, officials of the party and armed forces organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials and persons of merit of institutions and industrial establishments in Pyongyang.
					
					 Put on the stage which started with orchestra overture "Fly High, Our Party Flag" were such numbers as female solo "Care of the Mother Party", violin duet "Voice of My Heart" and orchestra "Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass."
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the revolutionary feats Kim Jong Un performed by ushering in an era of changes on all fronts of the socialist construction with his outstanding idea and leadership.
					
					 They successfully represented the strong stamina and might of the DPRK ushering in a new era of Mallima, firmly confident of sure victory in orchestras "Footstep", "Appearance of Korea" and "We Are Mallima Riders".

articles.title: Successful Folk Song Contesters Give Performance
articles.content:
Successful Folk Song Contesters Give Performance
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A performance was given on Mangyong Hill Wednesday by successful folk song contesters of art groups of schoolchildren's palaces and halls in celebration of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 It was enjoyed by Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, officials of the youth league, officials concerned and school youth and children.
					
					 The performance began with chorus "Day of Sun Is Eternal Thanks to Marshal". Its numbers included series of songs "We Sing of Mangyongdae", male vocal solo "The Last Born" and trio "Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass".
					
					 The performers represented the deep yearning for Kim Il Sung who put forward the children as king of the country and brought a rosy future to the younger generation with warm loving care in his lifetime.
					
					 Also staged were numbers depicting the children who are bringing their hopes and talents into full bloom under the warm care of the Party.

articles.title: Second-Day Performances of April Spring People's Art Festival Held
articles.content:
Second-Day Performances of April Spring People's Art Festival Held
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The second-day performances of the Fifth April Spring People's Art Festival were given at theatres and halls here on Wednesday.
					 The performers sang high praises of the revolutionary career and feats of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Artistes of the art squad of the Ministry of Railways and the art troupes of South Hamgyong Province put on the stage narration and chorus "The Day of the Sun, Spring Holiday", mixed sextet and dance "Our Great Holiday", etc.
					
					 Artistes of the Nampho City Art Troupe sang the song "The Leader Is without Parallel in the World" to mesmerize the audience. 
					
					 Artist troupes of Kangwon and south Phyongan provinces impressively represented strong yearning for the President in male quintet "Our Leader", etc.
					
					 Artistes of the art squads of the Capital City Construction Commission and North Phyongan Province represented in an excited tone the leadership of the President and the history of changes in the country in narration and female chorus "We Started from Scratch", etc.
					
					 Artistes of North Hwanghae Province Art Troupe represented the national pride and honor of the Korean people of holding in high esteem leader Kim Jong Il in chorus "Fortune of Korea", etc.
					
					 Artistes of South Hwanghae Province Art Troupe staged hymns reflecting the reverence of the people for Kim Jong Il. Members of art groups of the Sangwon Cement Complex and the Susongchon General Foodstuff Factory and itinerant art squads staged colorful numbers.
					
					 Multifarious magic pieces including illusionary jugglery, common jugglery and functional jugglery were also put on the stage.
					
					 Pyongyangites, youth and students enjoyed the performances.
					
					 The performances go on.

articles.title: National Fine Art Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Fine Art Exhibition Opens
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A national fine art exhibition was opened with due ceremony at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Wednesday in celebration of the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display at the venue of the exhibition are art pieces dealing with the revolutionary career of the President and exploits of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 Also on display are paintings reflecting the loyalty, indomitable fighting spirit and revolutionary optimism of the forerunners who steadfastly covered the rugged path of the arduous struggle, holding in high esteem President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as the unique center of unity and leadership.
					
					 Displayed there are fine art works of diverse themes making successful artistic representation of the stirring reality of the DPRK dashing ahead like the wind towards the eminence of a powerful socialist country under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and the happiness of the people.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, art creators and Pyongyangites.

articles.title: Winners of 28th Mangyongdae Prize International Marathon
articles.content:
Winners of 28th Mangyongdae Prize International Marathon
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The 28th Mangyongdae Prize International Marathon took place in Pyongyang on April 9.
					 Pak Chol and Jo Un Ok of the DPRK won the first place in men's and women's 42.195 km-long races.
					
					 Pak Chol of the Sajabong Sports Team bagged his third gold medal in this annual marathon to mark the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (April 15). Earlier, he breasted the tape in 2014 and 2016 marathon races. And he was selected as the DPRK's best marathoner for 2016. 
					
					 He has proved successful at different domestic races, including the 12th People's Games, and was awarded silver medal at the 15th Asian Marathon Championship.
					
					 Jo Un Ok of the Amnokgang Sports Team clocked two hours, 29 minutes and 23 seconds for the 28th marathon, thus breaking her records set at the 2016 Mangyongdae Prize International Marathon and 2016 Beijing Marathon.
					
					 She won the gold medal at the half marathon race of the Great Eastern Women's Run in 2016.

articles.title: Candy Sculpture Show Held
articles.content:
Candy Sculpture Show Held
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The 2nd candy sculpture show took place at Chongryu Restaurant from April 10 to 12 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Presented to the show were more than 2,860 sugar sculptures and at least 740 biscuit sculptures created by more than 120 technicians and cooks from dozens of dozens of foodstuff factories and public catering establishments.
					
					 Drawing interest of experts and spectators were those sculptures depicting monumental edifies in the era of the Workers' Party and heroes of cartoon films.
					
					 On display were sugar and biscuit sculptures depicting various fruits, animals and plants and landscape based on formative art.
					
					 There took place a demonstration of cooks and technicians, revving up the atmosphere of the show.

articles.title: Over Million People Visit Ryongjon Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Over Million People Visit Ryongjon Revolutionary Site
Pukchong, April 12 (KCNA) -- A lot of people visit the Ryongjon Revolutionary Site with the approach of the auspicious spring holiday of April, the greatest holiday of the nation.
					 The Ryongjon Revolutionary Site in Pukchong County, South Hamgyong Province is associated with the leadership exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who unrolled the blueprint for the development of fruit farming and brought about an epochal change through their energetic leadership.
					
					 More than one million of service personnel, working people of different social standings and school youth and children have visited the revolutionary site for the past three decades.

articles.title: Well-known Complex for Catfish Farming
articles.content:
Well-known Complex for Catfish Farming
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The Namhung Youth Chemical Complex in the DPRK, which is well-known across the country for successful stock-breeding, pomiculture and greenhouse vegetable production, has also made great achievements in catfish farming.
					 It produced a large amount of catfish last year and is breeding hundreds of thousands of fries.
					
					 The complex has a hatchery, catfish ponds covering nearly a hundred thousand square meters and assorted food production bases.
					
					 What draws attention in its catfish farming is that profitability is fully ensured by harnessing natural and geographical conditions.
					
					 The complex turned hollow areas and pools into catfish ponds which were enlarged several times bigger than the formers, and established a ring-shaped rotation production system to raise the weight increment.
					
					 Now, it is directing efforts to utilizing water treatment ponds for catfish farming.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Flails S. Korean Conservatives' Attempt to Build up Public Opinion Sympathetic with Park
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Flails S. Korean Conservatives' Attempt to Build up Public Opinion Sympathetic with Park
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The group of conservatives in south Korea has now gone clumsy in the scheme to elicit sympathy with Park Geun Hye now in detention.
					 Chongwadae, the Liberal Korea Party, the Association of Love for Park Geun Hye and other conservative riff-raffs described Park's detention as "too harsh", claiming "It's time to pardon her and it is not good to see woman shed tears after her ouster from Chongwadae".
					
					 In the meantime, the pro-Park group including the "movement headquarters for people's resistance for nullification of the president's impeachment" has worked hard to rally conservatives while calling for "defending Park Geun Hye" and "punishing those who pushed the country to such an edge".
					
					 The crocodile tears being shed by the conservatives, while deploring the plight of Park are an insult and challenge to the bitter tears shed by the south Koreans who have wriggled in misfortune and pain for the past four years under Park's harsh misrule.
					
					 This is nothing but a cynical ploy to galvanize public sympathy with Park, prolong their deplorable fate sealed along with the one of Park and use it as a catalyst for rallying the conservative forces.
					
					 Park has been put in detention after earning an ill-fame as the first dismissed ex-president in history, a deserved fate meted out to the dragon lady who committed unprecedented crimes.
					
					 Not tears but blood has been gathered in the eyes of the bereaved families for the past 1073 days since they lost their children in the ferry Sewol tragedy.
					
					 Insulting the bereaved families' protest as the one aimed at "getting more money", Park and the puppet conservative group painted them as "dishonest forces" and "political agitators". 
					
					 Leaving Chongwadae, demon-like Park said "truth will be probed," challenging the public demand for impeachment. It is the south Korean public mindset that dismembering her would not be enough to have the grudge of the victims settled.
					
					 However, the accomplices of Park have gone foolish in their bid to set up the second Park Geun Hye regime by rallying the remaining conservatives by building up the public opinion sympathetic with Park.
					
					 The despicable true nature of the conservative group, which turned south Korean society into a theatre of rowdyism dominated by injustice in alignment with traitor Park, can never be covered up.
					
					 The south Koreans should not be taken in by the crocodile tears of the demon but resolutely check and foil the conservative forces' moves for rallying themselves again.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Demands Probe into All Cursed Crimes of Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Demands Probe into All Cursed Crimes of Park Geun Hye
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Crimes committed by traitor Park Geun Hye and her group of south Korea are being disclosed one after another by the prosecution's investigation. Park is now in custody, sternly punished by the people.
					 Eleven suspected crimes on eight charges against the former chief secretary of Chongwadae for civil administration, a chief accomplice of the scandal case, were clarified to be followed by the endless disclosure of bribes paid to Park by big businesses.
					
					 It has been revealed that various documents of Chongwadae were handed over to Choe Sun Sil at the instruction of Park Geun Hye, and Choe personally paid the price for the dresses of Park, giving further clarity to the "interests-sharing" Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil relations.
					
					 Truth being disclosed nonstop is just a tip of iceberg of evidence proving the administrative records of the group of traitors full of unpopular and traitorous rule and anti-reunification crimes.
					
					 However, the traitor is denying all the crimes and behaving impudently while calling for reinforcing her defense counsel.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the shameless act of a handful of the puppet group of conservatives.
					
					 They are creating an atmosphere of confrontation in society while crying out for "nullification of impeachment" and "opposition to detention". And they try hard to build up public opinion sympathetic with Park, while talking about "poor president Park" and "tears of woman".
					
					 This is, however, the last-ditch desperate effort of the conservative forces upset by the evidence proving crimes being revealed one after another, to hush up the crimes and turn the table in their favor and prop up the conservative regime at any cost.
					
					 However hard the remnants of Park may try, they can never get rid of the abyss of destruction.
					
					 The punishment of Park is not just a matter pertaining to criminal law that can be settled through detention and shackling but it is a task before the times that demands the abolition of all evils like sycophancy toward outsiders, confrontation with fellow countrymen, fascist rule and scandals so that they may serve as a lesson of history.
					
					 The south Koreans from all walks of life are calling "detention of Park just as the beginning for abolishing evils" and asserting that "Park deserves life-long detention for all the crimes she committed". They strongly demand that all the crimes she committed be probed and she be severely punished.
					
					 The south Koreans who terminated the worst regime through candlelight actions of justice will never stand back from the struggle to root out all sorts of social evils.

articles.title: Space Will Bring Greater Well-Being to Mankind: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Space Will Bring Greater Well-Being to Mankind: Minju Joson
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson Wednesday dedicates an article to International Day of Man's Space Flight.
					 On April 12, 1961, Yuri Gagarin, an astronaut of the Soviet Union, took the spaceship Vostok and safely came back after going round the earth in one hour and 48 minutes and thus became the first man in the world to fly in the space.
					
					 His successful space flight marked an event that opened up a bright prospect for conquering the space, humankind's long-cherished desire, the article notes, and goes on: 
					
					 Space development at present is an essential work for the development and prosperity of countries and nations.
					
					 The DPRK striving to build a powerful socialist country has steadily pushed forward projects for conquering the space despite all sorts of obstructions of the hostile forces including the U.S. and proudly ranked itself among space powers as a satellite manufacturer and launcher.
					
					 Last year alone, it succeeded in the ground jet test of new type high-thrust engine for a geo-stationary satellite carrier rocket in the wake of successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong 4 and thus provided a solid foundation to rapidly develop the nation's space science and technology.
					
					 This year, the DPRK succeeded in its first ground jet test of high-thrust engine newly studied and manufactured in Korean style and thus laid a sci-tech foundation to match the world-level satellite carrier capability.
					
					 Putting spurs to the implementation of its five-year plan for national space development, the DPRK has made more rapid progress in space development and will register more spectacular successes in this respect.
					
					 The space will bring greater well-being to mankind as it is making sustained efforts to conquer the space with the desire to make steady progress and a leap forward.

articles.title: All-People Committee to Mark 70th Anniversary of Jeju April 3 Incident Formed in S. Korea
articles.content:
All-People Committee to Mark 70th Anniversary of Jeju April 3 Incident Formed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- South Koreans from all walks of life formed an all-people committee for commemorating the 70th anniversary of Jeju April 3 Incident in Seoul on April 8 to probe the truth behind the massacre of the participants in the Jeju April 3 Popular Uprising and settle the historic task, according to the south Korean News 1.
					 At the inaugural ceremony speakers said that they would struggle for probing the truth behind the Jeju April 3 incident, U.S. apology for massacres committed under the U.S. military rule, the regime's reparation for the victims and the bereaved families and amendment of the special law on the Jeju April 3 resistance.
					
					 They declared that they would strive to find a solution to the problem concerning the Jeju April 3 incident in solidarity with all forces including political camp, civic, public and academic circles.

articles.title: Chinese Praises Kim Il Sung as Supreme Incarnation of Moral Obligation
articles.content:
Chinese Praises Kim Il Sung as Supreme Incarnation of Moral Obligation
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- There would be no such leader in the world as President Kim Il Sung, supreme incarnation of noble revolutionary moral obligation who took warm care of even the children of his comrades-in-arms.
					 Zhang Jinquan, son of Zhang Weihua, a Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, said this when interviewed by KCNA on Wednesday.
					
					 He said that the President was not only the tender-hearted father of the Korean people but also benefactor of his family.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The President led my father along the road of the anti-Japanese revolution and made his life shine forever.
					
					 Thanks to his internationalist moral obligation and human love my father is remembered by all the Korean people still now.
					
					 There are many tales on comradeship and moral obligation in the world but there is no precedent that the head of a state saw to it that a monument was erected for an ordinary comrade-in-arms of a foreign country.
					
					 The President always recollected my father who dedicated his life to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and showed us warm paternal love which our father failed to do in his lifetime.
					
					 I can hardly find proper words to express the profound care the President showed for us by glorifying the life of my father and granting the greatest privilege to us by receiving us several times in one year.

articles.title: Report to 7th WPK Congress Off Press in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Report to 7th WPK Congress Off Press in Bulgaria
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's Report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee was brought out in booklet in Bulgaria on April 5.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in South Africa
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in South Africa
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The South African Communist Party organized a preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, on April 7.
					 Second Deputy General Secretary Solly Mapaila was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set a celebration period from April 8 to 17 and decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of the President and hold colorful political and cultural events supporting the just cause of the Korean army and people.

articles.title: 21st Seminar of World Political Parties Held in Mexico
articles.content:
21st Seminar of World Political Parties Held in Mexico
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The 21st seminar of political parties of the world on building a new society took place in Mexico from Mar. 23 to 25.
					 Present there were personages from political parties of Mexico and delegations and delegates of more than 130 political parties and organizations from 35 countries including the DPRK.
					
					 Congratulatory addresses were made and a congratulatory message from the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea read out to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The head of the DPRK delegation affirmed that this year marking the 25th anniversary of the Pyongyang Declaration, the WPK would constantly adhere to the spirit of the Declaration and strive to defend and victoriously advance the socialist cause in solidarity with the world progressive political parties which stand against aggression and war, domination and subjugation and aspire after the building of a righteous and independent, new society.
					
					 The national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, the general secretary of the Motherland Party for All of Venezuela, the international secretary of the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland), a delegate of the Workers' World Party of the United States of America and other speakers expressed full support to the Korean army and people in the struggle to smash every anti-DPRK move of the U.S. and its followers by beefing up the nuclear deterrent for self-defense.
					
					 A solidarity resolution was adopted in support of the just cause of the WPK and the Korean people at the seminar.
					
					 The resolution highly appreciated the eye-opening successes made by the WPK and the people in the all-out general offensive to implement the decision of the Seventh Congress of the WPK and reaffirmed the will to hold fast to the spirit of the historic Pyongyang Declaration and hold higher the banner of socialism.
					
					 It appealed to all the world progressive political parties and organizations to further step up the solidarity movement supporting the struggle of the WPK and the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Alberto Anaya Gutierrez
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Alberto Anaya Gutierrez
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le remitiera el dia 7 el dirigente nacional del Partido del Trabajo de Mexico, Alberto Anaya Gutierrez.
					En su misiva, el remitente rinde el mas sublime homenaje, en nombre de todos los militantes del Partido del Trabajo de Mexico y en el suyo propio, a Kim Il Sung, fundador de la Corea socialista y eterno Presidente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, en ocasion del 105o aniversario de su natalicio, dia significativo no solo para el pueblo coreano, sino para todos los revolucionarios del mundo.
					
					Recuerda que el Presidente Kim Il Sung, fundador del PTC y la RPDC, fue el gran ideologo y teorico quien creo la idea Juche y la enriquecio como pensamiento directriz de la epoca de independencia que ilumina el camino de construccion de nueva sociedad.
					
					Convencido de que bajo la sabia direccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, el pueblo coreano alcanzara siempre victorias en la defensa del socialismo y la lucha por construir una potencia economica y mejorar la vida del pueblo, le desea de todo corazon mayores exitos en sus nobles tareas para conducir a la victoria el PTC y la RPDC.

articles.title: Ofrecido concierto de Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional
articles.content:
Ofrecido concierto de Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 12 en el Teatro Moranbong el concierto "Gloria al General Kim Jong Un", ofrecido por la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional en homenaje al 5o aniversario de la eleccion de este dirigente coreano al cargo supremo del Partido y el Estado.
					Lo vieron Kim Yong Nam, Choe Ryong Hae, los cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los funcionarios de los organos del partido y las fuerzas armadas, el Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, ministerios e instituciones centrales, los funcionarios de los organos, fabricas y empresas de esta capital.
					
					En la escena del concierto, iniciado con el preludio orquestal "Flamea alto, la bandera de nuestro Partido", se pusieron el solo femenino "Regazo del Partido-Madre", el duo de violin "Voz de mi corazon", la musica orquestal "Mar de manzanas al pie del monte Chol", etc.
					
					Los ejecutantes describieron con emocion las hazanas del Maximo Dirigente quien con su destacada ideologia y direccion trajo la epoca de cambio en todos los dominios de la construccion socialista.
					
					Las musicas orquestales "Pasos", "Aspecto de Corea" y "Somos jinetes de Mallima" reflejaron el coraje y gallardo aspecto de la RPDC que abre nueva era de Mallima con la fe en la victoria.

articles.title: Inaugurada Exposicion Nacional de Bellas Artes por natalicio de Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Inaugurada Exposicion Nacional de Bellas Artes por natalicio de Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada la Exposicion Nacional de Bellas Artes por el 105o aniversario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					En la galeria de acto se veian las obras de bellas artes alusivas a la vida revolucionaria y proezas del Presidente.
					
					Ademas, se distinguian las pinturas que reflejan la fidelidad, el indoblegable espiritu combativo y el optimismo de los martires que han venido superando todas las dificultades teniendo al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il como centro de unidad y direccion.
					
					Estaban expuestas tambien otras obras de diferentes tipos que dan a conocer la felicidad del pueblo y la realidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que avanza hacia la cima de la potencia socialista bajo la guia del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					La ceremonia inaugural se efectuo el dia 12 en el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang.
					
					A la cita asistieron el vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, los funcionarios interesados, los creadores de bellas artes, asi como los trabajadores de esta capital.

articles.title: No se dejen enganar ante lagrimas de cocodrilo: comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
No se dejen enganar ante lagrimas de cocodrilo: comentario de ACNC
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- Ultimamente, los conservadores surcoreanos tratan de crear la opinion publica compasiva a la traidora encarcelada Park Geun-hye. 
					En cuanto a la encarcelacion de ella, los complices de Chongwadae, el "Partido de Corea Libre" y las entidades conservadoras dicen que es "el castigo demasiado cruel", "ya llego el momento de perdonar a Park Geun-hye" y "?quieren hacer llorar a la mujer expulsada de Chongwadae?".
					
					Entre tanto, la Direccion del Movimiento de Movilizacion General en la Resistencia Popular por la Invalidacion de la Dimision de la Presidenta y otros partidarios de Park se mueven con desesperacion para agrupar a las fuerzas conservadoras abogando por "defender a Park Geun-hye" y "enjuiciar a los culpables de la actual situacion del pais". 
					
					Tales disparates parten de la artimana para mantener su precaria vida politica caida en la crisis de arruinamiento junto con el destino tragico de Park despertando la opinion publica compasiva y utilizarla en la reagrupacion de las fuerzas conservadoras. 
					
					Park Geun-hye fue encarcelada con la ignominia de "mandataria" destituida antes de cumplirse su mandato por primera vez en la historia del Sur de Corea. Esto es el castigo merecido a sus crimenes inauditos. 
					
					Las lagrimas de cocodrilo de los conservadores surcoreanos constituyen un insulto y desafio a las otras de sangre derramadas por la poblacion surcoreana durante 4 anos de mandato de Park Geun-hye. En este periodo, los habitantes sufrieron incontables desgracias y sufrimientos siendo victimas de las politicas antipopulares de la traidora. 
					
					Durante mil 73 dias desde el hundimiento del ferry "Sewol", los familiares de victimas derramaron lagrimas de sangre. 
					
					Pero, Park Geun-hye y la camarilla conservadora les ofendieron con expresiones como "intento de recibir mas retribucion" y describiendolos de "fuerzas malvadas" y "agitadores politicos". 
					
					Hasta el momento de expulsarse de Chongwadae, la diabla Park desafio a la poblacion levantada en la lucha por su dimision disparateando que "sera esclarecida la verdad". 
					
					Sin embargo, los complices de ella intentan absurdamente fabricar el segundo "poder" de Park Geun-hye. 
					
					Es inocultable la naturaleza abominable de la banda conservadora que en complicidad de Park, convirtio la sociedad surcoreana en el lugar donde campea la injusticia.
					
					Los habitantes de diferentes estratos del Sur de Corea deben frustrar tajantemente el intento de reagruparse de las fuerzas conservadoras sin dejarse enganar ante las lagrimas de cocodrilo de estas.

articles.title: Hay que revelar de raiz los crimenes de Park Geun-hye: comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
Hay que revelar de raiz los crimenes de Park Geun-hye: comentario de ACNC
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- Siguen destapandose por la investigacion de fiscalia los actos criminales cometidos por la traidora Park Geun-hye, encarcelada luego de ser sentenciada por el pueblo surcoreano, y sus lacayos.
					Quedaron confirmadas 11 sospechas de 8 cargos que pesan al ex secretario superior para la administracion civil de Chongwadae, complice principal del reciente escandalo.
					
					Se revelan uno tras otro los casos de que Park Geun-hye ha recibido fabulosos fondos de soborno desde los consorcios.
					
					Ademas, se conoce el hecho de que los documentos de diversos tipos de Chongwadae fueron entregados a Choe Sun Sil segun la orden de Park y la primera pago personalmente las ropas para la segunda. Asi se evidencia que las relaciones entre Park y Choe resultan "las de compartimiento de intereses".
					
					Tales datos no pasan de ser una parte de las pruebas del trayecto de gobernacion de la banda traidora, lleno de crimenes antipopulares, antinacionales y anti-reunificacion.
					
					Sin embargo, Park actua descaradamente reforzando el panel de abogados y negando todos los hechos criminales durante la investigacion de fiscalia.
					
					Por otra parte, un punado de conservadores crea en la sociedad una atmosfera conflictiva reclamando la "invalidez de dimision" y rechazando la detencion de Park e intenta crear la opinion publica compasiva llamandola como "Presidenta pobrecita" y hablando de las "lagrimas de la mujer".
					
					Esto deviene el ultimo pataleo de las fuerzas conservadoras que intentan disimular a toda costa los delitos de Park ya revelados y mantener el "poder" conservador cambiando la situacion.
					
					Pero, los lacayos de Park no podran evitar el destino de arruinamiento.
					
					El castigo a la diabla de Chongwadae no es un simple asunto penal, sino constituye una tarea de la epoca de poner punto final al servilismo a grandes potencias, confrontacion fratricida, gobernacion fascista y corrupcion para dejar asi una leccion de la historia.
					
					Ahora, los surcoreanos de diferentes estratos insisten en que "la detencion de Park Geun-hye no es el fin, sino el comienzo de la eliminacion del mal" y "si suman todas las sospechas de crimen de Park, ella merece la cadena perpetua".
					
					Y demandan fuertemente revelar hasta el final los actos criminales de la traidora y castigarla duro.
					
					La poblacion surcoreana, que derrumbo el peor "poder" con velas de justicia, no dara ni un paso atras en la lucha por eliminar de raiz todos los males de la sociedad.

articles.title: Cosmos aportara mas bienestar a la humanidad, enfatiza Minju Joson
articles.content:
Cosmos aportara mas bienestar a la humanidad, enfatiza Minju Joson
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia Internacional de Vuelo Espacial Tripulado, el periodico Minju Joson publico este miercoles un articulo individual que sigue: 
					El 12 de abril de 1961, el cosmonauta sovietico Yuri Gagarin realizo por primera vez en el mundo el vuelo espacial a bordo de la astronave "Vostok" que dio una vuelta por el globo terraqueo durante una hora y 48 minutos.
					
					Este acontecimiento abrio buenas perspectivas para la conquista del cosmos, largo deseo de la humanidad. 
					
					Hoy dia, el desarrollo espacial es la tarea indispensable para el desarrollo y la prosperidad del pais y la nacion. 
					
					La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, empenada por construir una potencia socialista, realizo ingentes esfuerzos por conquistar el cosmos aun en medio de los impedimentos de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles y entro en la primera fila de potencias espaciales como pais fabricante y lanzador de satelite artificial. 
					
					En el ano pasado, lanzo con exito el satelite artificial de observacion de la Tierra Kwangmyongsong-4 y triunfo en la prueba estatica de la reaccion del motor de gran capacidad para el nuevo tipo de cohete transportador de satelite estacionario sentando asi la firme base para desarrollar vertiginosamente la ciencia y tecnica espaciales del pais. 
					
					Este ano, realizo exitosamente de una sola vez la prueba estatica de la reaccion del motor de gran capacidad, desarrollado nuevamente al estilo coreano. De esta manera, preparo la base cientifico-tecnica capaz de alcanzar el nivel mundial en la capacidad de transporte de satelite artificial. 
					
					Establecio el plan quinquenal para el desarrollo espacial y se esfuerza mucho por cumplirlo. En este proceso, se acelera mas el desarrollo espacial del pais y se alcanzaran relevantes exitos. 
					
					El cosmos aportara mas bienestar a la humanidad que emprende constantemente la conquista espacial con la aspiracion a desarrollarse sin parar.
